title: Disguise Self
content: - Reduce spell to become tiny. Can be used in conjunction with Speak with Dead to fool a corpse you killed to speak with you. Can be used in conjunction with Friends to fool a merchant if you drop the disguise before the merchant can accuse you of having enchanted him or her. Can be used to unlock magical weapon bonuses tied to race, e.g. gain +1d4 Psychic damage with Soulbreaker Greatsword even if you're another race using Disguise Self: Githyanki. Bug: You can't use reactions while using Disg
